analyzed: 北涼天竺三藏曇無讖譯
translated: Translated by Tripiṭaka Master Dharmakṣema of the Northern Liang

original: 檀波羅蜜品第五之三
analyzed: 檀波羅蜜品第五之三

original: 佛告寂意菩薩：
analyzed: 佛告寂意菩薩：

original: 其後復過無量無邊阿僧祇劫，此界轉名選擇諸惡。
analyzed: 其後復過無量無邊阿僧祇劫，此界轉名選擇諸惡。

analyzed: 爾時大劫名善等蓋，世亦五濁。
translated: At that time, the great eon will be called 'Good and Equal Cover,' and the world will also be defiled by the five turbidities.

original: 東方去此五十四天下，彼閻浮提名盧婆羅。
analyzed: 東方去此五十四天下，彼閻浮提名盧婆羅。
translated: Fifty-four worlds to the east of here, in that Jambudvīpa called 'Lupo Luo,'

original: 以願力故，生於彼中作轉輪聖王，主四天下，號虛空淨，教諸眾生安住十善及三乘中。
analyzed: 以願力故，生於彼中作轉輪聖王，主四天下，號虛空淨，教諸眾生安住十善及三乘中。
translated: by the power of his vows, he will be born there as a wheel-turning sage king, ruling the four continents, called 'Pure Sky,' teaching sentient beings to abide in the ten wholesome deeds and the three vehicles.

original: 我於爾時布施一切無所分別，是時多有無量乞兒來，從我乞種種珍寶、金銀、琉璃、頗梨、錢貨、青琉璃珠、大青琉璃、火珠摩尼，所有珍寶少不足言，乞者無量，我於是時即問大臣：
analyzed: 我於爾時布施一切無所分別，是時多有無量乞兒來，從我乞種種珍寶、金銀、琉璃、頗梨、錢貨、青琉璃珠、大青琉璃、火珠摩尼，所有珍寶少不足言，乞者無量，我於是時即問大臣：
translated: At that time, I gave everything without discrimination. At that time, there were countless beggars who came to me to beg for various precious treasures, gold, silver, lapis lazuli, crystal, coins, blue lapis lazuli beads, great blue lapis lazuli, fire-pearl maṇi, and other precious treasures. There were few and insufficient words, and the beggars were countless. At that time, I asked the great minister:

original: 『如是珍寶從何處生？
analyzed: 『如是珍寶從何處生？
translated: 'Where do such precious treasures come from?'

original: 』大臣答言：
analyzed: 』大臣答言：
translated: The great minister replied:

original: 『是諸龍王之所示現，雖有此寶惟供聖王，不能廣及如是乞者。
analyzed: 『是諸龍王之所示現，雖有此寶惟供聖王，不能廣及如是乞者。
translated: 'This is what the dragon kings have manifested. Although there are such treasures, they are only for the sage king and cannot be widely given to such beggars.'

original: 』「我於爾時作大誓願：
analyzed: 』「我於爾時作大誓願：
translated: At that time, I made a great vow:

original: 『若我未來於五濁中，厚重煩惱，人壽百歲，必定成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，作大龍王，示現種種珍寶之藏，於此選擇諸惡世界，在在處處四天下中，於一一天下七返受身，一一身中，示現無量百千萬億那由他等珍寶之藏，一一寶藏縱廣正等一千由旬，各各充滿種種珍寶，如上所說給施眾生。
analyzed: 『若我未來於五濁中，厚重煩惱，人壽百歲，必定成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，作大龍王，示現種種珍寶之藏，於此選擇諸惡世界，在在處處四天下中，於一一天下七返受身，一一身中，示現無量百千萬億那由他等珍寶之藏，一一寶藏縱廣正等一千由旬，各各充滿種種珍寶，如上所說給施眾生。
translated: 'If in the future, in the five turbidities, with heavy afflictions, when the human lifespan is one hundred years, I will definitely attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and if my wishes are fulfilled and I attain my own benefit, I will become a great dragon king, manifesting various precious treasures, in this selected evil world, in each of the four continents, I will take on a body seven times, and in each body, I will manifest countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of nayutas of precious treasure stores, and each treasure store will be a thousand yojanas long and wide, each filled with various precious treasures, as described above, giving them to sentient beings.

original: 如我在此一世界中精勤用意，如是次第遍十方如恒河沙等五濁惡世無佛國土，於一一佛土一一天下七返受身，乃至如上所說。
analyzed: 如我在此一世界中精勤用意，如是次第遍十方如恒河沙等五濁惡世無佛國土，於一一佛土一一天下七返受身，乃至如上所說。
translated: Just as I diligently apply myself in this one world, in this way, I will gradually pervade the ten directions, like the sands of the Ganges River, in the five turbidities and evil worlds without Buddha-lands, in each Buddha-land, in each continent, I will take on a body seven times, up to as described above.'

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 我作如是善願。
analyzed: 我作如是善願。
translated: I made such a good vow.

original: 爾時天人有百千億，在虛空中，雨種種華而讚我言：🔽『善哉！
analyzed: 爾時天人有百千億，在虛空中，雨種種華而讚我言： 『善哉！
translated: At that time, hundreds of thousands of millions of gods in the sky rained down various flowers and praised me, saying:🔽'Excellent!

original: 善哉！
analyzed: 善哉！
translated: Excellent!

original: 一切布施，汝今已得，如心所願。
analyzed: 一切布施，汝今已得，如心所願。
translated: You have now attained the ability to give everything as you wish.'

original: 』善男子！
analyzed: 』善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 爾時，大眾聞虛空淨王，諸天作字，號一切施，聞是事已，各各相謂：
analyzed: 爾時，大眾聞虛空淨王，諸天作字，號一切施，聞是事已，各各相謂：
translated: At that time, the great assembly heard that the gods in the sky gave the name 'All Giving' to King Pure of the Void. Having heard this, they each said to each other:

original: 『我等今者應往乞求難捨之物，若能捨者，可得名為一切布施。
analyzed: 『我等今者應往乞求難捨之物，若能捨者，可得名為一切布施。
translated: 'We should now go to him and ask for things that are difficult to give up. If he is able to give them, he can be called All Giving.

original: 如其不能，何得稱為一切施也？
analyzed: 如其不能，何得稱為一切施也？
translated: If he is unable to, how can he be called All Giving?'

original: 』是時諸人各各從王，乞索後宮夫人、婇女及兒息等。
analyzed: 』是時諸人各各從王，乞索後宮夫人、婇女及兒息等。
translated: At that time, the people each went to the king and begged for his harem of wives, concubines, and children.

original: 時轉輪王聞是事已，心大歡喜，隨其所索，悉皆與之。
analyzed: 時轉輪王聞是事已，心大歡喜，隨其所索，悉皆與之。
translated: When the wheel-turning king heard this, he was greatly delighted and gave them everything they asked for.

original: 是時諸人復更相謂：
analyzed: 是時諸人復更相謂：
translated: At that time, the people again said to each other:

original: 『如是妻子皆是易捨，非難事也。
analyzed: 『如是妻子皆是易捨，非難事也。
translated: Such wives and children are all easy to give up, not difficult matters.

original: 今當從王乞身支節，若能捨者，真可得名能捨一切。
analyzed: 今當從王乞身支節，若能捨者，真可得名能捨一切。
translated: Now we should ask the king for his body parts. If he can give them away, he can truly be called one who can give away everything.

original: 』「爾時，諸人往大王所，於是眾中，有乞兒，字青光明，受持狗戒，向轉輪王作如是言：
analyzed: 』「爾時，諸人往大王所，於是眾中，有乞兒，字青光明，受持狗戒，向轉輪王作如是言：
translated: At that time, the people went to the great king. Among the crowd, there was a beggar named Blue Light, who observed the precepts of a dog. He said to the wheel-turning king:

original: 『大王若是一切施者，唯願施我此閻浮提。
analyzed: 『大王若是一切施者，唯願施我此閻浮提。
translated: 'Great King, if you are a giver of everything, please give me this Jambudvīpa.'

original: 』我時聞已，心大歡喜，尋以香水洗浴其人，令著柔軟上妙衣服，以水灌頂，紹聖王位，持閻浮提即以施之。
analyzed: 』我時聞已，心大歡喜，尋以香水洗浴其人，令著柔軟上妙衣服，以水灌頂，紹聖王位，持閻浮提即以施之。
translated: When I heard this, I was greatly delighted. I immediately washed the man with fragrant water, had him put on soft and wonderful clothes, consecrated him as the holy king, and gave him Jambudvīpa.

original: 復作是願：
analyzed: 復作是願：
translated: I then made this vow:

original: 『如我以此閻浮提施，是因緣故，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 『如我以此閻浮提施，是因緣故，成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: 'As I give Jambudvīpa, by this cause and condition, I will attain supreme perfect enlightenment.

original: 所願成就得己利者，是閻浮提所有人民，皆當承順奉敬此人以為王者。
analyzed: 所願成就得己利者，是閻浮提所有人民，皆當承順奉敬此人以為王者。
translated: Those whose wishes are fulfilled and who attain their own benefit will be the people of Jambudvīpa who will all follow and respect this person as their king.

original: 復令此人壽命無量，作轉輪王。
analyzed: 復令此人壽命無量，作轉輪王。
translated: Moreover, this person's lifespan will be immeasurable, and he will become a wheel-turning king.

original: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，當與授記一生當得補佛之處。
analyzed: 我成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提已，當與授記一生當得補佛之處。
translated: After I attain supreme perfect enlightenment, I will give him a prediction that in one lifetime he will attain the position of a buddha.'

original: 』「有婆羅門名曰盧志，復來從我乞其兩足。
analyzed: 』「有婆羅門名曰盧志，復來從我乞其兩足。
translated: There was a brāhman named Rujhi who came to me again and begged for my two feet.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即持利刀，自斷二足，持以施之，施已發願：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即持利刀，自斷二足，持以施之，施已發願：
translated: When I heard this, I was overjoyed. I immediately took a sharp knife, cut off my two feet, and gave them to him. After giving them, I made a vow:

original: 『願我來世具足當得無上戒足。
analyzed: 『願我來世具足當得無上戒足。
translated: 'May I in the future be fully endowed with the supreme feet of precepts.'

original: 』有婆羅門，名曰牙，復來從我乞索二目。
analyzed: 』有婆羅門，名曰牙，復來從我乞索二目。
translated: There was a brāhman named Danti who came to me again and begged for my two eyes.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即挑二目持以與之，施已發願：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即挑二目持以與之，施已發願：
translated: When I heard this, I was overjoyed. I immediately gouged out my two eyes and gave them to him. After giving them, I made a vow:

original: 『願我來世當得具足無上五眼。
analyzed: 『願我來世當得具足無上五眼。
translated: 'May I in the future attain the unsurpassed five eyes in their entirety.'

original: 』未久之間，有婆羅門，名淨堅牢，復來從我乞索二耳。
analyzed: 』未久之間，有婆羅門，名淨堅牢，復來從我乞索二耳。
translated: Before long, there was a Brahmin named Pure Firmness who came to me and begged for my two ears.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，尋自割耳持以施之，施已發願：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，尋自割耳持以施之，施已發願：
translated: Upon hearing this, I was overjoyed and immediately cut off my ears to give to him. After giving them, I made a vow:

original: 『願我來世當得具足無上智耳。
analyzed: 『願我來世當得具足無上智耳。
translated: 'May I in the future attain the unsurpassed wisdom ears in their entirety.'

original: 』未久之間，有尼乾子，名想，復來從我乞索男根。
analyzed: 』未久之間，有尼乾子，名想，復來從我乞索男根。
translated: Before long, there was a Nirgrantha named Thought who came to me and begged for my male organ.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，尋即自割持以施之，施已發願：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，尋即自割持以施之，施已發願：
translated: Upon hearing this, I was overjoyed and immediately cut it off to give to him. After giving it, I made a vow:

original: 『願我來世成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得馬藏相。
analyzed: 『願我來世成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提得馬藏相。
translated: 'May I in the future attain supreme perfect enlightenment and obtain the mark of the hidden male organ.'

original: 』未久之間，復有人來，從我乞索其身血肉。
analyzed: 』未久之間，復有人來，從我乞索其身血肉。
translated: Before long, there was someone who came to me and begged for the blood and flesh of my body.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即便施之，施已發願：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，即便施之，施已發願：
translated: Upon hearing this, I was overjoyed and immediately gave it to him. After giving it, I made a vow:

original: 『願我來世具足無上金色之相。
analyzed: 『願我來世具足無上金色之相。
translated: 'May I in my future lives be endowed with the unsurpassed golden-colored body.'

original: 』未久之間，有婆羅門，名曰蜜味，復來從我求索二手。
analyzed: 』未久之間，有婆羅門，名曰蜜味，復來從我求索二手。
translated: Not long after, there was a Brahmin named Madhu who came to me and asked for my two hands.

original: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，右手持刀尋斷左手，作如是言：
analyzed: 我聞是已，心生歡喜，右手持刀尋斷左手，作如是言：
translated: Upon hearing this, I was overjoyed. With my right hand, I held a knife and cut off my left hand, saying:

original: 『今此右手不能自割，卿自取之。
analyzed: 『今此右手不能自割，卿自取之。
translated: 'This right hand cannot cut itself. You may take it.'

original: 』作是施已，復發願言：
analyzed: 』作是施已，復發願言：
translated: Having made this offering, I made a vow, saying:

original: 『願我來世具足當得無上信手。
analyzed: 『願我來世具足當得無上信手。
translated: 'May I in my future lives be fully endowed with the unsurpassed hand of faith.'

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 我截如是諸支節已，其身血流，復作願言：
analyzed: 我截如是諸支節已，其身血流，復作願言：
translated: After cutting off these various limbs and joints, the blood flowed from my body, and I made a vow, saying:

original: 『因此施故，必定成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，其餘身分重得受者。
analyzed: 『因此施故，必定成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，其餘身分重得受者。
translated: 'Because of this offering, I will definitely attain supreme, perfect enlightenment. If my wishes are fulfilled and I attain my own benefit, may the rest of my body be restored.'

original: 』爾時非聖不知思義，諸小王等及諸大臣皆作是言：
analyzed: 』爾時非聖不知思義，諸小王等及諸大臣皆作是言：
translated: At that time, the non-sages did not understand the meaning of my thoughts. The minor kings and ministers all said:

original: 『咄哉愚人！
analyzed: 『咄哉愚人！
translated: 'Alas, foolish man!

original: 如何自割身體支節，令諸自在一旦衰滅，其餘肉摶復何所直？
analyzed: 如何自割身體支節，令諸自在一旦衰滅，其餘肉摶復何所直？
translated: How can you cut off your own body and limbs, causing all the自在s to suddenly perish? What is the point of the remaining pieces of flesh?'

original: 』是時，大臣即持我身，送著城外曠野塚間，各還所止。
analyzed: 』是時，大臣即持我身，送著城外曠野塚間，各還所止。
translated: At that time, the ministers took my body and sent it to the wilderness cemetery outside the city, each returning to their place.

original: 時有無量蚊虻蠅等唼食我血，狐狼、野干、鵰鷲之屬，悉來噉肉。
analyzed: 時有無量蚊虻蠅等唼食我血，狐狼、野干、鵰鷲之屬，悉來噉肉。
translated: At that time, there were countless mosquitoes, gadflies, flies, and others that sucked my blood, and foxes, wolves, jackals, and birds of prey all came to eat my flesh.

original: 我於爾時命未斷間，心生歡喜，復作願言：
analyzed: 我於爾時命未斷間，心生歡喜，復作願言：
translated: At that time, when my life was not yet cut off, joy arose in my mind, and I made a vow, saying:

original: 『如我捨於一切自在及諸支節，乃至一念不生瞋恚及悔恨心，若我所願成就得己利者，當令此身，作大肉山，有諸飲血噉肉眾生，悉來至此，隨意飲噉。
analyzed: 『如我捨於一切自在及諸支節，乃至一念不生瞋恚及悔恨心，若我所願成就得己利者，當令此身，作大肉山，有諸飲血噉肉眾生，悉來至此，隨意飲噉。
translated: 'Just as I let go of all自在s and all my limbs, and not even a single thought of anger or regret arose, if my wishes are fulfilled and I attain my own benefit, I vow to transform this body into a great mountain of flesh, and may all beings who drink blood and eat flesh come here and drink and eat as they please.

original: 』作是願已，尋有眾生悉來食噉，本願力故，其身轉大高千由旬，縱廣正等五百由旬。
analyzed: 』作是願已，尋有眾生悉來食噉，本願力故，其身轉大高千由旬，縱廣正等五百由旬。
translated: Having made this vow, sentient beings came and ate it all. By the power of the original vow, his body grew larger, a thousand yojanas high and five hundred yojanas wide.

original: 滿千歲中，以此血肉給施眾生。
analyzed: 滿千歲中，以此血肉給施眾生。
translated: For a thousand years, he gave away his blood and flesh to sentient beings.

original: 我於爾時所捨舌根，令諸虎狼、鵄梟、鵰鷲食之飽足，以願力故，復生如本，假當聚集如耆闍崛山，作是施已，復作是願：
analyzed: 我於爾時所捨舌根，令諸虎狼、鵄梟、鵰鷲食之飽足，以願力故，復生如本，假當聚集如耆闍崛山，作是施已，復作是願：
translated: At that time, I gave away my tongue, allowing tigers, wolves, owls, and vultures to eat it to their fill. By the power of the vow, it grew back as before. If gathered together, it would be like Mount Gṛdhrakūṭa. Having made this offering, I made this vow:

original: 『願我來世具足得成廣長舌相。
analyzed: 『願我來世具足得成廣長舌相。
translated: 'May I in the future fully attain the mark of a broad and long tongue.'

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 我時命終在閻浮提，以本願故，生於龍中，作大龍王，名示現寶藏，即於生夜，示現百千億那由他種種寶藏，自宣令言：
analyzed: 我時命終在閻浮提，以本願故，生於龍中，作大龍王，名示現寶藏，即於生夜，示現百千億那由他種種寶藏，自宣令言：

On the night of my birth, I manifested hundreds of thousands of koṭis of nayutas of various treasure stores and proclaimed myself, saying:

original: 『今是分中，多有寶藏，其中具足諸珍異物，金銀乃至摩尼寶珠。
analyzed: 『今是分中，多有寶藏，其中具足諸珍異物，金銀乃至摩尼寶珠。
translated: 'In this part, there are many treasure troves, replete with various precious things, gold, silver, up to maṇi jewels.'

original: 』是諸眾生聞是唱已，各各自恣取諸寶物隨意所用。
analyzed: 』是諸眾生聞是唱已，各各自恣取諸寶物隨意所用。
translated: When these sentient beings heard this proclamation, each took the precious things as they wished and used them as they saw fit.

original: 用已具足行十善道，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，或發聲聞辟支佛心。
analyzed: 用已具足行十善道，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，或發聲聞辟支佛心。
translated: Having used them, they fully practiced the ten wholesome deeds, gave rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and some gave rise to the mind of the śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha.

original: 我於爾時在龍王中，七返受身，壽命七萬七千億那由他百千歲，示現無量無邊阿僧祇寶藏，與諸眾生。
analyzed: 我於爾時在龍王中，七返受身，壽命七萬七千億那由他百千歲，示現無量無邊阿僧祇寶藏，與諸眾生。
translated: At that time, I took on a body as a dragon king seven times, with a lifespan of 77,000 koṭīs of nayutas of hundreds of thousands of years, and manifested immeasurable, limitless, incalculable treasure troves to give to sentient beings.

original: 爾時安住無量無邊阿僧祇人於三乘中，勸令具足行十善道，以種種無量珍寶滿眾生已，復發願言：
analyzed: 爾時安住無量無邊阿僧祇人於三乘中，勸令具足行十善道，以種種無量珍寶滿眾生已，復發願言：
translated: At that time, I encouraged immeasurable, limitless, incalculable people to fully practice the ten wholesome deeds in the three vehicles, and having fulfilled the desires of sentient beings with various immeasurable precious treasures, I made a vow, saying:

original: 『願我來世具足，當得三十二相。
analyzed: 『願我來世具足，當得三十二相。
translated: 'May I in the future fully attain the thirty-two marks.

original: 』如是第二天下，亦復七生作大龍王，乃至遍滿選擇世界在在處處諸四天下，悉作如是無量利益。
analyzed: 』如是第二天下，亦復七生作大龍王，乃至遍滿選擇世界在在處處諸四天下，悉作如是無量利益。
translated: In the same way, in the second world, he was born seven times as a great dragon king, and so on, throughout the entire world system of a billion worlds, in all the four continents, bringing immeasurable benefits.

original: 乃至十方無量無邊無佛世界，一一世界一一天下，亦復七生作大龍王，壽命七萬七千億那由他百千歲，示現如是無量無邊阿僧祇寶藏，亦復如是。
analyzed: 乃至十方無量無邊無佛世界，一一世界一一天下，亦復七生作大龍王，壽命七萬七千億那由他百千歲，示現如是無量無邊阿僧祇寶藏，亦復如是。
translated: And so on, in the immeasurable, boundless, buddha-less worlds in the ten directions, in each world, in each four-continent world, he was also born seven times as a great dragon king, with a lifespan of 77,000 koṭīs of nayutas of hundreds of thousands of years, manifesting such immeasurable, boundless, asaṃkhyeya treasures, and so on.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 汝今當知，是謂如來為菩薩時，深重精進求三十二相之因緣也。
analyzed: 汝今當知，是謂如來為菩薩時，深重精進求三十二相之因緣也。
translated: You should know that this is the cause and condition for the Tathāgata's seeking the thirty-two marks while he was a bodhisattva.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 如來為菩薩時，所行精進除上八人，過去世中更無能及。
analyzed: 如來為菩薩時，所行精進除上八人，過去世中更無能及。
translated: The diligence practiced by the Tathāgata when he was a bodhisattva, except for the above eight people, no one in the past could match.

original: 若過去無者，當知未來諸菩薩等，亦復不能如是勤行深重精進如我所行。
analyzed: 若過去無者，當知未來諸菩薩等，亦復不能如是勤行深重精進如我所行。
translated: If there were no past, one should know that future bodhisattvas will also be unable to diligently practice profound and grave effort like I have practiced.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 復過無量無邊阿僧祇劫，此界轉名珊瑚池，劫名華手，是時無佛，其世五濁。
analyzed: 復過無量無邊阿僧祇劫，此界轉名珊瑚池，劫名華手，是時無佛，其世五濁。
translated: After countless, boundless asaṃkhyeya kalpas, this world will be called Coral Pond, and the kalpa will be called Flower Hand. At that time there will be no Buddha, and the world will be defiled by the five turbidities.

original: 我於是中作釋提桓因，名善日光明，觀閻浮提，見諸眾生轉行惡法，我時即化為夜叉像，其形可畏，下閻浮提住諸人前。
analyzed: 我於是中作釋提桓因，名善日光明，觀閻浮提，見諸眾生轉行惡法，我時即化為夜叉像，其形可畏，下閻浮提住諸人前。
translated: I will be born in this world as Śakra Devānām Indra, named Good Sun Light. Observing Jambudvīpa, I will see that sentient beings are increasingly engaging in evil practices. I will then transform into a terrifying yakṣa form and descend to Jambudvīpa to stand before the people.

original: 諸人見我皆生怖畏，而問我言：
analyzed: 諸人見我皆生怖畏，而問我言：
translated: When the people see me, they will all be frightened and will ask me,

original: 『欲何所須？
analyzed: 『欲何所須？
translated: 'What do you need?

original: 願速說之。
analyzed: 願速說之。
translated: Please speak quickly.'

original: 』我時答言：
analyzed: 』我時答言：
translated: I will then reply,

original: 『唯須飲食，更無所須。
analyzed: 『唯須飲食，更無所須。
translated: 'I only need food and drink, and nothing else.'

original: 』其人復問：
analyzed: 』其人復問：
translated: The people will ask again,

analyzed: 『欲食何等？
translated: 'What do you wish to eat?'

original: 』我復答言：
analyzed: 』我復答言：
translated: I will reply again,

original: 『唯殺於人，噉其血肉。
analyzed: 『唯殺於人，噉其血肉。
translated: 'Only by killing humans and eating their blood and flesh.

original: 汝等若能盡其形壽持不殺戒，乃至正見，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，若發聲聞、緣覺心者，我即不復食噉汝等。
analyzed: 汝等若能盡其形壽持不殺戒，乃至正見，發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，若發聲聞、緣覺心者，我即不復食噉汝等。
translated: If you can uphold the precept against killing, and so on up to right view, and arouse the mind of supreme perfect enlightenment, or the mind of a śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha, then I will no longer eat you.'

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: 'Good man!

original: 我於爾時常作化人，以供食飲。
analyzed: 我於爾時常作化人，以供食飲。
translated: At that time, I always created transformed people to provide food and drink.

original: 爾時眾生見我如是，倍生怖畏，悉皆盡形受不殺戒，乃至正見，或發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，或發聲聞、辟支佛心。
analyzed: 爾時眾生見我如是，倍生怖畏，悉皆盡形受不殺戒，乃至正見，或發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，或發聲聞、辟支佛心。
translated: At that time, sentient beings saw me like this, and their fear doubled. They all upheld the precept against killing for the rest of their lives, up to right view, and some aroused the mind of supreme perfect enlightenment, some aroused the mind of a śrāvaka or pratyekabuddha.

original: 我勸如是閻浮提內一切眾生，修行十善住三乘已，復作誓願：
analyzed: 我勸如是閻浮提內一切眾生，修行十善住三乘已，復作誓願：
translated: After I encouraged all the sentient beings in Jambudvīpa to practice the ten wholesome deeds and abide in the three vehicles, I made a vow:

original: 『若我必成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，復當勸此四天下人令行十善道，乃至遍滿此之世界，在在處處四天下中，以如是相貌，令諸眾生行十善道，勸化發於三乘之心。
analyzed: 『若我必成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，所願成就得己利者，復當勸此四天下人令行十善道，乃至遍滿此之世界，在在處處四天下中，以如是相貌，令諸眾生行十善道，勸化發於三乘之心。
translated: 'If I am certain to attain supreme perfect enlightenment, and my wishes are fulfilled and I attain my own benefit, I will further encourage the people of the four continents to practice the ten wholesome paths, and so on, filling this world everywhere, in all the four continents, with such appearances, causing sentient beings to practice the ten wholesome paths and inspire the mind of the three vehicles.

original: 如是遍滿一世界已，乃至十方無量無邊阿僧祇等五濁惡世，無佛國土，亦復如是。
analyzed: 如是遍滿一世界已，乃至十方無量無邊阿僧祇等五濁惡世，無佛國土，亦復如是。
translated: Having thus filled one world, I will do the same in the ten directions, in the immeasurable, limitless asaṃkhyeyas of the five turbidities and evil worlds without buddha-lands.'

original: 』「善男子！
analyzed: 』「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 我於爾時發是願已，一切成就，於珊瑚池世界化作可畏夜叉之像，調伏眾生，令住十善及三乘中。
analyzed: 我於爾時發是願已，一切成就，於珊瑚池世界化作可畏夜叉之像，調伏眾生，令住十善及三乘中。
translated: When I made this vow at that time, everything was accomplished. In the Coral Pool world, I transformed into a terrifying yakṣa image, subduing sentient beings and causing them to abide in the ten wholesome paths and the three vehicles.

original: 如是遍於十方無量無邊阿僧祇等五濁惡世，無佛國土，作夜叉像，調伏眾生，令行十善，住三乘中。
analyzed: 如是遍於十方無量無邊阿僧祇等五濁惡世，無佛國土，作夜叉像，調伏眾生，令行十善，住三乘中。
translated: In this way, in the ten directions, in immeasurable, limitless, incalculable defiled worlds without Buddhas, I take on the form of a yakṣa to subdue sentient beings, causing them to practice the ten wholesome deeds and abide in the three vehicles.

original: 我於往昔恐怖眾生，令行十善，住三乘中，以是業因緣故，今得坐於菩提樹下，欲成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，天魔波旬與諸大眾，來至我所，欲得壞亂我菩提道。
analyzed: 我於往昔恐怖眾生，令行十善，住三乘中，以是業因緣故，今得坐於菩提樹下，欲成阿耨多羅三藐三菩提時，天魔波旬與諸大眾，來至我所，欲得壞亂我菩提道。
translated: In the past, I frightened sentient beings, causing them to practice the ten wholesome deeds and abide in the three vehicles. Because of this karmic cause and effect, now when I am about to attain supreme perfect enlightenment under the bodhi tree, the heavenly demon Pāpīyān, together with his great assembly, comes to where I am in order to destroy and disturb my path to enlightenment.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 略說我為菩薩之時，檀波羅蜜。
analyzed: 略說我為菩薩之時，檀波羅蜜。
translated: In brief, for me as a bodhisattva, it was the perfection of giving.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good man!

original: 諸大菩薩甚深法忍，微妙總持，解脫三昧，我於爾時悉未得之，唯除二身有漏五通。
analyzed: 諸大菩薩甚深法忍，微妙總持，解脫三昧，我於爾時悉未得之，唯除二身有漏五通。
translated: The profound Dharma patience, subtle dhāraṇī, liberation samādhi of the great bodhisattvas, at that time I had not yet attained them all, except for the two bodies and the five supernormal cognitive abilities with outflows.

original: 我於爾時作此大事，令無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於辟支佛乘，無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於聲聞乘中，況復兼得供養諸佛，如一佛世界微塵數等，一一佛邊所得功德，數如大海諸水渧等，供養無量聲聞、緣覺、師長、父母、五通神仙，亦復如是。
analyzed: 我於爾時作此大事，令無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於辟支佛乘，無量無邊阿僧祇人安止住於聲聞乘中，況復兼得供養諸佛，如一佛世界微塵數等，一一佛邊所得功德，數如大海諸水渧等，供養無量聲聞、緣覺、師長、父母、五通神仙，亦復如是。
translated: At that time, I accomplished this great matter, causing immeasurable, limitless, incalculable people to abide in anuttarā-samyak-saṃbodhi, immeasurable, limitless, incalculable people to abide in the pratyekabuddha vehicle, and immeasurable, limitless, incalculable people to abide in the śrāvaka vehicle. Moreover, I also made offerings to buddhas equal to the number of dust motes in a buddha-land, and the merit I obtained from each buddha was as numerous as the water drops in the great ocean. I also made offerings to immeasurable śrāvakas, pratyekabuddhas, teachers, parents, and the five supernormal powers, in the same way.

original: 如我昔者，為菩薩時，自以血肉供給眾生，如是大悲，今諸羅漢，悉無是心。
analyzed: 如我昔者，為菩薩時，自以血肉供給眾生，如是大悲，今諸羅漢，悉無是心。
translated: As I was a bodhisattva in the past, I used my own blood and flesh to provide for sentient beings. Such great compassion is not in the minds of the arhats now.

original: 」6 入定三昧門品悲華經入定三昧門品第六爾時，佛告寂意菩薩摩訶薩言：

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 如我今者，以佛眼見十方世界，如一佛土微塵等諸佛世尊般涅槃者，皆悉是我昔所勸化初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜者，未來之世亦復如是。
analyzed: 如我今者，以佛眼見十方世界，如一佛土微塵等諸佛世尊般涅槃者，皆悉是我昔所勸化初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜者，未來之世亦復如是。
translated: As I now see with the Buddha-eye the worlds in the ten directions, as numerous as the dust motes in a Buddha-land, the Buddha-World-Honored Ones who have entered parinirvāṇa, all of whom I formerly inspired to first give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and practice the pāramitās of giving, up to prajñā, those in the future will also be like this.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 我今見此東方世界無量無邊阿僧祇等諸佛世尊，今現在世轉正法輪，亦是我昔初勸令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行六波羅蜜者。
analyzed: 我今見此東方世界無量無邊阿僧祇等諸佛世尊，今現在世轉正法輪，亦是我昔初勸令發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，行六波羅蜜者。
translated: I now see in the eastern world, in worlds as numerous as the dust motes in an ineffable number of Buddha-lands, the innumerable, boundless, ineffable number of Buddha-World-Honored Ones who are now in the world turning the wheel of the true Dharma. They are also those whom I formerly first inspired to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment and practice the six pāramitās.

original: 南西北方四維上下，亦復如是。
analyzed: 南西北方四維上下，亦復如是。
translated: In the south, west, north, the four intermediate directions, and above and below, it is the same.

original: 「善男子！
analyzed: 「善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 東方去此八十九億諸佛世界，彼有世界名曰善華，是中有佛，號無垢功德光明王如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，今現在為眾生說法。
analyzed: 東方去此八十九億諸佛世界，彼有世界名曰善華，是中有佛，號無垢功德光明王如來、應、正遍知、明行足、善逝、世間解、無上士、調御丈夫、天人師、佛、世尊，今現在為眾生說法。
translated: In the east, eighty-nine koṭīs of buddha worlds away from here, there is a world called Good Flower, in which there is a buddha named Vimalaguṇaprabhāsaśrī Tathāgata, Arhat, Perfectly Enlightened One, Perfect in Knowledge and Conduct, Well-Gone, Knower of the Secular World, Unsurpassed Person, Tamer, Teacher of Gods and Men, Buddha, World-Honored One, who is now in the present expounding the Dharma for the sake of sentient beings.

original: 彼佛亦是我昔所勸初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，令行檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜。🔽東方復有妙樂世界，是中有佛號阿閦如來。🔽復有閻浮世界，是中有佛，號日藏如來。
analyzed: 彼佛亦是我昔所勸初發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，令行檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜。 東方復有妙樂世界，是中有佛號阿閦如來。 復有閻浮世界，是中有佛，號日藏如來。
translated: That buddha was also one whom I encouraged in the past to first give rise to the mind of supreme perfect enlightenment, to practice the perfection of giving, up to the perfection of wisdom.🔽In the east there is also a world called Wonderful Joy, in which there is a buddha called Akṣobhya Tathāgata.🔽There is also a world called Jambūdvīpa, in which there is a buddha called Sūryagarbha Tathāgata.

original: 復有世界名樂自在，是中有佛，號樂自在音光明如來。
analyzed: 復有世界名樂自在，是中有佛，號樂自在音光明如來。
translated: There is also a world called Joyful Freedom, in which there is a buddha called Sukhāvatī-raśmi Tathāgata.

original: 復有世界名曰安樂，是中有佛，號智日如來。
analyzed: 復有世界名曰安樂，是中有佛，號智日如來。
translated: There is also a world called Bliss, where there is a Buddha called Wisdom Sun Tathāgata.

original: 復有世界名勝功德，是中有佛，號龍自在如來。
analyzed: 復有世界名勝功德，是中有佛，號龍自在如來。
translated: There is also a world called Supreme Merit, where there is a Buddha called Dragon Sovereign Tathāgata.

original: 復有世界名善相，是中有佛，號金剛稱如來。
analyzed: 復有世界名善相，是中有佛，號金剛稱如來。

translated: In this way, the innumerable and boundless asaṃkhyeyas of present Buddhas in the east who turn the wheel of the Dharma for the sake of sentient beings, when they had not yet given rise to the unsurpassed bodhi mind, I first encouraged them to give rise to the anuttara-samyak-saṃbodhi mind, and I also led them to the places of the Buddhas in the ten directions, wherever they were. translated: West of here, past eighty-nine koṭīs of buddha-lands, there is a land called Sahā, where there is a buddha named Śākyamuni Tathāgata, who is now expounding the Dharma of past causes and conditions to the fourfold assembly.

original: 彼佛世尊為菩薩時，初勸化我發阿耨多羅三藐三菩提心，復引導我至諸佛所，初令我行檀波羅蜜，乃至般若波羅蜜。

translated: That Buddha-World-Honored One, when he was a bodhisattva, first inspired and transformed me to give rise to the mind of supreme, perfect enlightenment, and then led me to the buddhas, first causing me to practice the perfection of giving, up to the perfection of wisdom.

analyzed: 我於爾時，隨所至處，即得初受阿耨多羅三藐三菩提記。
translated: At that time, wherever I went, I immediately attained the initial prediction of supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 彼佛世尊釋迦牟尼，即是我之真善知識，今在西方處在大眾，為諸四部說本緣經。
analyzed: 彼佛世尊釋迦牟尼，即是我之真善知識，今在西方處在大眾，為諸四部說本緣經。
translated: That Buddha-World-Honored One Shakyamuni is my true good and wise advisor. He is now in the west, dwelling in the great assembly, speaking the sutra of past causes and conditions for the fourfold assembly.

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！

original: 此善華世界諸菩薩等皆得神通，於諸菩薩功德自在，今日清旦見是大光，其光悉從諸佛世界來至於此，大地時時六種震動，雨種種華，見是事已，有無量百千萬億諸菩薩等，欲以神力往娑婆世界見釋迦牟尼佛，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚歎，并欲諮受解了一切陀羅尼門。
analyzed: 此善華世界諸菩薩等皆得神通，於諸菩薩功德自在，今日清旦見是大光，其光悉從諸佛世界來至於此，大地時時六種震動，雨種種華，見是事已，有無量百千萬億諸菩薩等，欲以神力往娑婆世界見釋迦牟尼佛，供養、恭敬、尊重、讚歎，并欲諮受解了一切陀羅尼門。
translated: The bodhisattvas in this Good Flower World all attained spiritual powers and were masters of the bodhisattva virtues. Today at dawn they saw this great light, the light coming from all the buddha-realms to this place, the great earth shaking in six ways from time to time, and various flowers raining down. Having seen these things, there were countless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of bodhisattvas who wanted to use their spiritual powers to go to the Sahā world to see Śākyamuni Buddha, make offerings, pay homage, respect, praise, and receive and accept the dhāraṇī gate that comprehends all.

analyzed: 」彼佛尋伸金色右臂，於五指頭放於種種微妙光明，其光即照八十九億諸佛國土至娑婆世界。

translated: At that time, the bodhisattvas, because of the light, were able to see the Sahā world, filled with bodhisattva-mahāsattvas, and also devas, nāgas, yakṣas, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, and so forth, filling the sky.

original: 彼所住處，寬博無邊，彼佛所有無量功德不可思議，以本願故，悲心廣大，乃令無量諸眾生類入於佛法受三歸依，然後為說三乘之法，復說三戒、示三脫門，復拔無量無邊眾生於三惡道，安止令住三善道中。
analyzed: 彼所住處，寬博無邊，彼佛所有無量功德不可思議，以本願故，悲心廣大，乃令無量諸眾生類入於佛法受三歸依，然後為說三乘之法，復說三戒、示三脫門，復拔無量無邊眾生於三惡道，安止令住三善道中。
translated: The place where they reside is vast and boundless. The immeasurable merits of that Buddha are inconceivable. Due to his original vows, his compassionate mind is vast, causing immeasurable sentient beings to enter the Buddha's teachings and accept the Three Refuges. He then expounds the teachings of the Three Vehicles for them, and also explains the Three Precepts and demonstrates the Three Gates of Liberation. He further rescues immeasurable and boundless sentient beings from the Three Evil Paths of Existence and establishes them in the Three Good Paths of Existence.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！

translated: At one time, not long after Shakyamuni Tathagata attained supreme enlightenment, in order to subdue sentient beings, he sat in full lotus posture on the terrace of the Sala Cave on Mount Vihara for seven days and seven nights, entering the bliss of samadhi and liberation. translated: After seven days, twelve koṭis of nayutas of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas from worlds in the ten directions arrived at the Sahā world and stayed on the edge of that mountain, wishing to see the Tathāgata Śākyamuni, make offerings, pay homage, revere, praise, and receive the wonderful Dharma.

translated: After the bodhisattvas had entered, they saw that the cave was vast and magnificently adorned. There were bodhisattvas making offerings to the Buddha with the lion's play and mastery of spiritual powers. Each bodhisattva sat on a transformed jeweled seat to listen to the Dharma.

original: 善男子！

analyzed: 如是南方無量無邊阿僧祇等現在諸佛，悉是我昔為菩薩時，初可勸發菩提心者，是諸世尊師子座處亦皆震動，彼諸佛等，亦各讚歎我之功德，亦遣無量無邊阿僧祇等諸大菩薩，持月光明無垢淨華，悉來至此娑婆世界耆闍崛山，見佛、禮拜、供養、恭敬、尊重、讚歎，却坐一面次第聽法。
translated: In the same way, the present buddhas in the south, innumerable and boundless asaṃkhyeyas, were all initially inspired by me to generate the mind of enlightenment when I was a bodhisattva. analyzed: 「東北方去此百千那由他佛世界，彼有世界名無垢，是中有佛，號離熱惱增毘沙門娑羅王如來，有二菩薩，一名寶山，二名光明觀。
translated: In the northeast, past a hundred thousand koṭis of buddha-lands, there is a world called Stainless. In it there is a buddha named Viṣṇu King of the Śāla Tree, Free from Affliction, with two bodhisattvas, one named Jewel Mountain and the other Light Contemplation.

original: 復有壞諸魔佛、娑羅王佛、大力光明佛、蓮華增佛、栴檀佛、彌樓王佛、堅沈水佛、火智大力佛。
analyzed: 復有壞諸魔佛、娑羅王佛、大力光明佛、蓮華增佛、栴檀佛、彌樓王佛、堅沈水佛、火智大力佛。
translated: There are also buddhas named Destroying Māra, Śāla King Buddha, Powerful Light Buddha, Lotus Increase Buddha, Sandalwood Buddha, Sumeru King Buddha, Firm Water Plant Buddha, Fire Wisdom Powerful Buddha.

original: 如是無量諸佛如來，乃至北方四維上下，皆亦如是。
analyzed: 如是無量諸佛如來，乃至北方四維上下，皆亦如是。
translated: Thus, immeasurable buddhas and tathāgatas, up to the north, the four intermediate directions, and above and below, are all like this.

original: 」爾時，釋迦牟尼如來，以大神力，為欲容受如是眾故，即一一變來會者身，極令微細如亭歷子，娑婆世界虛空及地，彌滿側塞間無空處乃至一毛。
analyzed: 」爾時，釋迦牟尼如來，以大神力，為欲容受如是眾故，即一一變來會者身，極令微細如亭歷子，娑婆世界虛空及地，彌滿側塞間無空處乃至一毛。
translated: At that time, Śākyamuni Tathāgata, with his great spiritual powers, in order to accommodate such an assembly, transformed each person in the assembly, making them extremely tiny like mustard seeds. The sky and ground of the Sahā world were filled to the point that there was no space left, not even enough for a single hair.

original: 時諸眾生各不相見，亦復不見大小諸山、須彌山王、大小鐵圍二山中間幽冥之處，及上諸天所有宮殿，下至不見金剛地際，唯除一人佛世尊也。
analyzed: 時諸眾生各不相見，亦復不見大小諸山、須彌山王、大小鐵圍二山中間幽冥之處，及上諸天所有宮殿，下至不見金剛地際，唯除一人佛世尊也。
translated: At that time, the sentient beings did not see each other, nor did they see the large and small mountains, Mount Sumeru, the two mountains of the inner and outer iron mountain ranges, the dark places in between, and the palaces of the gods above, down to not seeing the adamantine ground, except for the World-Honored One, the Buddha.

original: 爾時，釋迦牟尼如來復入遍虛空斷諸法定意三昧，令此無量月光淨華，悉入一切身諸毛孔，一切大眾悉皆自見。
analyzed: 爾時，釋迦牟尼如來復入遍虛空斷諸法定意三昧，令此無量月光淨華，悉入一切身諸毛孔，一切大眾悉皆自見。
translated: At that time, Shakyamuni Tathagata again entered the samadhi of pervading the sky to sever all dharmas, causing these immeasurable pure moon-light flowers to all enter the pores of all bodies, and the entire assembly all saw this.

original: 爾時，眾生都不憶念佛色身相，唯見毛孔，有妙園觀，其園觀中，有諸寶樹，其樹復有種種莖葉，華果茂盛，種種寶衣、天幡、幢蓋、天冠、寶飾、真珠、瓔珞，所有莊嚴，譬如西方安樂世界。
analyzed: 爾時，眾生都不憶念佛色身相，唯見毛孔，有妙園觀，其園觀中，有諸寶樹，其樹復有種種莖葉，華果茂盛，種種寶衣、天幡、幢蓋、天冠、寶飾、真珠、瓔珞，所有莊嚴，譬如西方安樂世界。
translated: At that time, the sentient beings did not think of the Buddha's physical appearance at all, only seeing the pores, with wonderful gardens, in the gardens there were jeweled trees, the trees had various trunks and leaves, with luxuriant flowers and fruits, various jeweled garments, heavenly banners, pennants, canopies, heavenly crowns, jeweled ornaments, and pearl necklaces, with all the adornments like the Western Land of Ultimate Bliss.

original: 是諸大眾見是事已，復作思惟：
analyzed: 是諸大眾見是事已，復作思惟：
translated: When the great assembly saw this, they thought again:

original: 「今我當往遊觀彼園。
analyzed: 「今我當往遊觀彼園。
translated: Now we should go to visit that garden.

original: 」爾時，唯除三惡眾生及無色天，其餘所有一切大眾，皆從毛孔入如來身，處園而坐。
analyzed: 」爾時，唯除三惡眾生及無色天，其餘所有一切大眾，皆從毛孔入如來身，處園而坐。
translated: At that time, except for the three evil beings and the formless gods, all the remaining great assembly entered the Tathagata's body through his pores, and sat in the garden.

original: 爾時，如來還捨神足，時諸大眾各各還得如本相見，各相謂言：
analyzed: 爾時，如來還捨神足，時諸大眾各各還得如本相見，各相謂言：
translated: At that time, the Tathagata withdrew his spiritual powers, and the great assembly each regained their original appearance, and said to each other:

original: 「如來今者為在何處？
analyzed: 「如來今者為在何處？
translated: Where is the Tathagata now?

original: 」爾時，彌勒菩薩告諸大眾：
analyzed: 」爾時，彌勒菩薩告諸大眾：
translated: At that time, Maitreya Bodhisattva said to the great assembly:

original: 「汝等當知，我今與汝等，悉在如來身分之中。
analyzed: 「汝等當知，我今與汝等，悉在如來身分之中。
translated: You should know that I and you are all within the Tathagata's body.

original: 」爾時，大眾即見如來身之內外，尋自覺知與無量大眾集聚，共處如來身中，復相謂言：
analyzed: 」爾時，大眾即見如來身之內外，尋自覺知與無量大眾集聚，共處如來身中，復相謂言：
translated: At that time, the great assembly saw the inside and outside of the Tathagata's body, and immediately realized that they were together with immeasurable great assemblies, all dwelling within the Tathagata's body. They said to each other:

original: 「我等為從何處得入？
analyzed: 「我等為從何處得入？
translated: Where did we enter from?

original: 誰將導我令入是中？
analyzed: 誰將導我令入是中？
translated: Who will guide me and lead me into it?

original: 」彌勒菩薩復告之曰：🔽「諦聽！
analyzed: 」彌勒菩薩復告之曰： 「諦聽！
translated: Maitreya Bodhisattva said to him again:🔽Listen carefully!

original: 諦聽！
analyzed: 諦聽！
translated: Listen carefully!

original: 如來今者現大神通變化之力，復為利益我等大眾將欲說法，仁等今當一心專念。
analyzed: 如來今者現大神通變化之力，復為利益我等大眾將欲說法，仁等今當一心專念。
translated: The Tathāgata is now manifesting the power of great spiritual transformations and supernatural powers, and for the benefit of our great assembly he is about to speak the Dharma. You should now single-mindedly focus your thoughts.

original: 」爾時，大眾聞是語已，長跪合掌，受教而聽。
analyzed: 」爾時，大眾聞是語已，長跪合掌，受教而聽。
translated: At that time, when the great assembly heard these words, they knelt for a long time with palms joined, received the teaching, and listened.

original: 爾時，世尊以一切行門而演說法：
analyzed: 爾時，世尊以一切行門而演說法：
translated: At that time, the World-Honored One expounded the Dharma through all the approaches of practice, saying:

original: 「何等名為一切行門？
analyzed: 「何等名為一切行門？
translated: What are called all the approaches of practice?

original: 出生死淤泥，入八聖道，具足成就得一切智。
analyzed: 出生死淤泥，入八聖道，具足成就得一切智。
translated: Emerging from the mud of birth and death, entering the eightfold noble path, fully accomplishing and attaining omniscience.

original: 善男子！
analyzed: 善男子！
translated: Good sons!

original: 有十專心發於菩提，能入是門。
analyzed: 有十專心發於菩提，能入是門。
translated: There are ten single-mindedly aroused bodhicittas that can enter this approach.

original: 何等為十？
analyzed: 何等為十？
translated: What are the ten?

original: 一者欲令眾生悉得解脫，迴向隨喜故；
analyzed: 一者欲令眾生悉得解脫，迴向隨喜故；
translated: First, in order to enable all sentient beings to attain liberation, one turns toward and rejoices in it;

original: 二者發大悲心攝眾生故；
analyzed: 二者發大悲心攝眾生故；
translated: Second, one arouses the great compassionate mind in order to gather in sentient beings;

original: 三者欲度未度，精勤修治無上法船故；
analyzed: 三者欲度未度，精勤修治無上法船故；
translated: Third, in order to liberate those who are not yet liberated, they diligently cultivate the unsurpassed Dharma boat;

original: 四者欲解未解者莊嚴，觀脫於虛妄顛倒故；
analyzed: 四者欲解未解者莊嚴，觀脫於虛妄顛倒故；
translated: Fourth, in order to liberate those who are not yet liberated, they adorn the liberation from false and inverted views;

original: 五者欲師子吼無所怖畏莊嚴，觀於諸法性無我故；
analyzed: 五者欲師子吼無所怖畏莊嚴，觀於諸法性無我故；
translated: Fifth, in order to roar the lion's roar without fear, they contemplate the nature of all dharmas as being selfless;

original: 六者欲隨所到一切世界心無分別，善學諸法，同十喻故；
analyzed: 六者欲隨所到一切世界心無分別，善學諸法，同十喻故；
translated: Sixth, in order to go to all worlds without discrimination, they skillfully study the ten analogies;

original: 七者欲得光明莊嚴世界，修治戒聚，令清淨故；
analyzed: 七者欲得光明莊嚴世界，修治戒聚，令清淨故；
translated: Seventh, in order to attain the adornment of the world with light, they cultivate and purify the precepts;

original: 八者成就莊嚴如來十力，具足一切波羅蜜故；
analyzed: 八者成就莊嚴如來十力，具足一切波羅蜜故；
translated: Eighth, in order to accomplish the adornment of the Tathāgata's ten powers, they perfect all pāramitās;

original: 九者成就莊嚴四無所畏，如說而作故；
analyzed: 九者成就莊嚴四無所畏，如說而作故；
translated: Ninth, in order to accomplish the adornment of the four fearlessnesses, they practice as taught;

original: 十者莊嚴十八不共之法，隨所聞法悉得無餘，不放逸故。
analyzed: 十者莊嚴十八不共之法，隨所聞法悉得無餘，不放逸故。
translated: Tenth, in order to adorn the eighteen distinctive qualities of the Buddha, they attain all the teachings they hear without exception, due to being diligent.

original: 是名十法專心，發於無上菩提，則能入是一切行門，即得不退無上菩提、無相行門、智道行門，一切法無我心、無思惟，不生不滅，是名菩薩不退轉地。
analyzed: 是名十法專心，發於無上菩提，則能入是一切行門，即得不退無上菩提、無相行門、智道行門，一切法無我心、無思惟，不生不滅，是名菩薩不退轉地。
translated: These are called the ten dharmas that single-mindedly give rise to unsurpassed bodhi. One is then able to enter this gateway of all practices, and attain the non-retrogression of unsurpassed bodhi, the gateway of signless practice, the gateway of the practice of wisdom, the selflessness of all dharmas, non-contemplation, non-arising and non-ceasing. This is called the stage of non-retrogression for bodhisattvas.

original: 以是故，非退非不退，非斷非常，非定非亂。
analyzed: 以是故，非退非不退，非斷非常，非定非亂。
translated: For this reason, it is neither retrogression nor non-retrogression, neither annihilation nor permanence, neither definite nor confused.

original: 」說是法時，如來腹內八十億恒河沙等菩薩摩訶薩，得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不可數菩薩摩訶薩得諸三昧甚深法忍，悉從如來身毛孔出，心大驚怪，歎未曾有。
analyzed: 」說是法時，如來腹內八十億恒河沙等菩薩摩訶薩，得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，不可數菩薩摩訶薩得諸三昧甚深法忍，悉從如來身毛孔出，心大驚怪，歎未曾有。
translated: When this Dharma was being spoken, eighty koṭīs of nayutas of Ganges-like sands of bodhisattva-mahāsattvas in the Tathāgata's belly attained non-retrogression from unsurpassed, perfect enlightenment. Innumerable bodhisattva-mahāsattvas attained various samādhis and the profound acceptance of the Dharma, all emerging from the Tathāgata's pores. They were greatly astonished and marveled at this unprecedented event.

original: 即於佛前，頭面著地，為佛作禮，起已忽然各還十方本佛世界，復聞釋迦牟尼如來所演音聲，過十方無量無邊阿僧祇等諸佛世界，無諸障閡。
analyzed: 即於佛前，頭面著地，為佛作禮，起已忽然各還十方本佛世界，復聞釋迦牟尼如來所演音聲，過十方無量無邊阿僧祇等諸佛世界，無諸障閡。
translated: They immediately bowed their heads to the ground, made obeisance to the Buddha, and then suddenly returned to their original buddha-realms in the ten directions. They continued to hear the sounds emanating from Śākyamuni Tathāgata, which passed through the buddha-realms of the ten directions, immeasurable and boundless asaṃkhyeyas in number, without any obstruction.

original: 是諸菩薩雖還彼界，續聞如來所演音教，章句義味無所減少，如在佛前，近聽無異。
analyzed: 是諸菩薩雖還彼界，續聞如來所演音教，章句義味無所減少，如在佛前，近聽無異。
translated: Although these bodhisattvas returned to their realms, they continued to hear the teachings expounded by the Tathāgata, with no decrease in the meaning and flavor of the phrases and sentences, as if they were listening to the Buddha in person, without any difference.

original: 身亦如是，遍諸十方無量世界。
analyzed: 身亦如是，遍諸十方無量世界。
translated: Their bodies were also present in the immeasurable worlds of the ten directions.

original: 亦有無量無邊阿僧祇菩薩、聲聞，亦見毛孔出入無礙。
analyzed: 亦有無量無邊阿僧祇菩薩、聲聞，亦見毛孔出入無礙。
translated: There were also immeasurable, boundless asaṃkhyeyas of bodhisattvas and śrāvakas who also saw the unobstructed coming and going through the pores.

original: 如是第二，乃至一切一一毛孔出入無礙，十方世界亦如是。
analyzed: 如是第二，乃至一切一一毛孔出入無礙，十方世界亦如是。
translated: In the same way, the second and all the other pores were unobstructed, and the worlds of the ten directions were also like this.

original: 爾時，大眾從釋迦如來毛孔中出，頭面禮佛，右繞三匝，住於佛前，以種種音聲而讚歎佛。
analyzed: 爾時，大眾從釋迦如來毛孔中出，頭面禮佛，右繞三匝，住於佛前，以種種音聲而讚歎佛。
translated: At that time, the great assembly emerged from Śākyamuni's pores, bowed their heads to the Buddha, circumambulated him three times to the right, and stood before the Buddha, praising him with various sounds.

original: 爾時，欲界、色界諸天，雨種種華、塗香、末香、幢幡、瓔珞，微妙技樂供養如來。
analyzed: 爾時，欲界、色界諸天，雨種種華、塗香、末香、幢幡、瓔珞，微妙技樂供養如來。
translated: At that time, the devas of the desire realm and form realm rained down various flowers, ointments, incense powders, banners, canopies, and necklaces, and made subtle music offerings to the Tathāgata.

original: 爾時，會中有一菩薩名無畏等地，長跪叉手，前白佛言：
analyzed: 爾時，會中有一菩薩名無畏等地，長跪叉手，前白佛言：
translated: At that time, in the assembly there was a bodhisattva named Ground of Fearlessness and Equality, who knelt with palms joined and addressed the Buddha, saying:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 如是大經當名何等？
analyzed: 如是大經當名何等？
translated: What should this great sūtra be called?

original: 云何奉持？
analyzed: 云何奉持？
translated: How should it be upheld?

original: 」佛告無畏等地菩薩：
analyzed: 」佛告無畏等地菩薩：
translated: The Buddha told the bodhisattva Ground of Fearlessness and Equality:

original: 「是經當名『解了一切陀羅尼門』，亦名『無量佛』，亦名『大眾』，亦名『授菩薩記』，亦名『四無所畏出現於世』，亦名『一切諸三昧門』，亦名『示現諸佛世界』，亦名『猶如大海』，亦名『無量』，亦名『大悲蓮華』。
analyzed: 「是經當名『解了一切陀羅尼門』，亦名『無量佛』，亦名『大眾』，亦名『授菩薩記』，亦名『四無所畏出現於世』，亦名『一切諸三昧門』，亦名『示現諸佛世界』，亦名『猶如大海』，亦名『無量』，亦名『大悲蓮華』。
translated: This sutra should be called 'Understanding All Dharani Gates', also called 'Immeasurable Buddhas', also called 'Great Assembly', also called 'Giving Bodhisattvas Predictions', also called 'The Four Fearlessnesses Appearing in the World', also called 'All Samadhi Gates', also called 'Displaying the Buddha Lands', also called 'Like the Great Ocean', also called 'Immeasurable', also called 'Great Compassion Lotus'.

original: 」無畏等地菩薩摩訶薩復白佛言：
analyzed: 」無畏等地菩薩摩訶薩復白佛言：
translated: The Bodhisattva-Mahasattvas of the stage of fearlessness and so forth further said to the Buddha:

original: 「世尊！
analyzed: 「世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 若有善男子、善女人，受持是經，讀誦通利，為他人說，乃至一偈，得幾所福？
analyzed: 若有善男子、善女人，受持是經，讀誦通利，為他人說，乃至一偈，得幾所福？
translated: If there are good men and good women who uphold this sutra, recite and master it, and explain it to others, even just a single verse, how much merit will they obtain?

original: 」佛告無畏等地菩薩：
analyzed: 」佛告無畏等地菩薩：
translated: The Buddha told the Bodhisattva of the stage of fearlessness and so forth:

original: 「我已先說所得福德，今當為汝更略說之。
analyzed: 「我已先說所得福德，今當為汝更略說之。
translated: I have already explained the merit obtained before, but now I will briefly explain it for you again.

original: 善男子、善女人若有受持是經，讀誦通利，為他人說，乃至一偈，於後五十歲中，乃至有能書寫一偈，所得功德勝諸菩薩十大劫中行六波羅蜜。
analyzed: 善男子、善女人若有受持是經，讀誦通利，為他人說，乃至一偈，於後五十歲中，乃至有能書寫一偈，所得功德勝諸菩薩十大劫中行六波羅蜜。
translated: If good men and good women receive and uphold this sutra, recite and master it, and explain it to others, even just a single verse, for the next fifty years, and if there are those who can write even a single verse, the merit they will obtain surpasses that of all bodhisattvas practicing the six perfections for ten great eons.

original: 何以故？
analyzed: 何以故？
translated: Why is this?

original: 諸天魔、梵、沙門、婆羅門、夜叉、羅剎、龍、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、拘辦荼、餓鬼、毘舍遮、人及非人，有瞋恚心者，聞是經已，即得清淨、柔軟、歡喜，而離諸病、忿怒、怨賊，種種鬪諍，消滅一切暴風惡雨，病者得愈，飢渴者得飽滿，受諸快樂，和合相順。
analyzed: 諸天魔、梵、沙門、婆羅門、夜叉、羅剎、龍、乾闥婆、阿修羅、迦樓羅、緊那羅、摩睺羅伽、拘辦荼、餓鬼、毘舍遮、人及非人，有瞋恚心者，聞是經已，即得清淨、柔軟、歡喜，而離諸病、忿怒、怨賊，種種鬪諍，消滅一切暴風惡雨，病者得愈，飢渴者得飽滿，受諸快樂，和合相順。
translated: The devas, māras, Brahmā, śramaṇas, brāhmaṇas, yakṣas, rākṣasas, dragons, gandharvas, asuras, garuḍas, kiṃnaras, mahoragas, kumbhāṇḍas, hungry ghosts, piśācas, humans, and non-humans, those with angry minds, having heard this sutra, will immediately attain purity, gentleness, and joy, and be free from various illnesses, anger, enemies, and various disputes. It will extinguish all violent winds and bad rains. The sick will be cured, and the hungry and thirsty will be satisfied. They will experience various kinds of happiness and harmonize with each other.

original: 瞋恚之者，能令忍辱。
analyzed: 瞋恚之者，能令忍辱。
translated: Those who are angry can be made to be patient.

original: 怖畏者無所畏怖，受諸歡樂。
analyzed: 怖畏者無所畏怖，受諸歡樂。
translated: Those who are afraid have nothing to fear and receive all kinds of joy and happiness.

original: 有煩惱者令離煩惱，能令善根一切增長，能拔惡道所有眾生，能示三乘出要之路，能得甚深法忍三昧陀羅尼門，能與眾生作大利益，能坐道場金剛之座，能破四魔，能示一切助菩提法，能轉法輪。
analyzed: 有煩惱者令離煩惱，能令善根一切增長，能拔惡道所有眾生，能示三乘出要之路，能得甚深法忍三昧陀羅尼門，能與眾生作大利益，能坐道場金剛之座，能破四魔，能示一切助菩提法，能轉法輪。
translated: Those with afflictions can be made to be free from afflictions, able to increase all wholesome roots, able to rescue sentient beings from the evil destinies, able to show the path to liberation through the three vehicles, able to attain profound forbearance, samādhi, and dhāraṇī, able to greatly benefit sentient beings, able to sit on the vajra seat at the site of enlightenment, able to destroy the four māras, able to demonstrate all the factors of enlightenment, and able to turn the wheel of the Dharma.

original: 無聖財者能令具足，能令無量無邊眾生入無畏城。
analyzed: 無聖財者能令具足，能令無量無邊眾生入無畏城。
translated: Those who lack the wealth of the noble ones can be made to be complete, and able to cause immeasurable and boundless sentient beings to enter the city of fearlessness.

original: 以是因緣，能持此經，讀誦通利，為他人說乃至一偈，若後末世五十歲中，乃至有能書寫一偈，得如是等無量無邊福德之聚。
analyzed: 以是因緣，能持此經，讀誦通利，為他人說乃至一偈，若後末世五十歲中，乃至有能書寫一偈，得如是等無量無邊福德之聚。
translated: For these causes and conditions, those who uphold this sūtra, recite it, master it, and explain it to others, even just a single verse, or in the future during the fifty-year period, those who are able to write even a single verse, will attain such immeasurable and boundless accumulations of merit and virtue.

original: 是故我今說如是經，如是大經當付囑誰？
analyzed: 是故我今說如是經，如是大經當付囑誰？
translated: Therefore, I now proclaim this sutra. To whom should I entrust this great sutra?

original: 誰能於後五十歲中護持是法？
analyzed: 誰能於後五十歲中護持是法？
translated: Who can uphold this Dharma for the next fifty years?

original: 誰能與諸在在處處不退菩薩宣說令聞？
analyzed: 誰能與諸在在處處不退菩薩宣說令聞？
translated: Who can proclaim and spread it to the non-regressing bodhisattvas everywhere?

original: 誰復能為行非法、欲惡、貪邪見、不信善惡，有果報者，演布是教？
analyzed: 誰復能為行非法、欲惡、貪邪見、不信善惡，有果報者，演布是教？
translated: Who can expound this teaching to those who engage in unwholesome conduct, have evil desires, covet wrong views, and do not believe in the fruits of good and evil actions?

original: 」爾時，大眾皆知佛心。
analyzed: 」爾時，大眾皆知佛心。
translated: At that time, the great assembly all knew the Buddha's thoughts.

original: 於時有一大仙夜叉，名無怨沸宿，坐於眾中。
analyzed: 於時有一大仙夜叉，名無怨沸宿，坐於眾中。
translated: There was a great sage-like yaksha named Avirantakusuma sitting in the assembly.

original: 爾時彌勒菩薩摩訶薩即從坐起，將是夜叉至於佛所。
analyzed: 爾時彌勒菩薩摩訶薩即從坐起，將是夜叉至於佛所。
translated: At that time, Maitreya Bodhisattva Mahasattva rose from his seat, took the yaksha to where the Buddha was,

original: 是時如來告是夜叉大仙：
analyzed: 是時如來告是夜叉大仙：
translated: and the Tathagata told the sage-like yaksha:

original: 「汝今當受是經，乃至末後五十歲中，為不退菩薩，乃至不信善惡報者，演布是教。
analyzed: 「汝今當受是經，乃至末後五十歲中，為不退菩薩，乃至不信善惡報者，演布是教。
translated: You should now receive this sutra and spread this teaching to the non-regressing bodhisattvas and those who do not believe in the fruits of good and evil actions for the next fifty years.

original: 」爾時，夜叉即白佛言：
analyzed: 」爾時，夜叉即白佛言：
translated: At that time, the yakṣa said to the Buddha:

original: 「我於過去八十四大劫中，以本願故，作仙夜叉，修行阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，爾時教化無量無邊阿僧祇人，安止於四無量心，復令無量無邊眾生不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
analyzed: 「我於過去八十四大劫中，以本願故，作仙夜叉，修行阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，爾時教化無量無邊阿僧祇人，安止於四無量心，復令無量無邊眾生不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。
translated: In the past, for eighty-four great kalpas, due to my original vows, I became a celestial yakṣa, practicing supreme, perfect enlightenment. At that time, I taught and transformed immeasurable, limitless asaṃkhyeyas of people, causing them to abide in the four immeasurables, and also caused immeasurable, limitless beings to not regress from supreme, perfect enlightenment.

original: 世尊！
analyzed: 世尊！
translated: World-Honored One!

original: 我今當為未來之世一切眾生作擁護故，於後末世五十歲中，受持是經，乃至從他聞四句偈，要當讀誦悉令通利，流布與人，令不斷絕。
analyzed: 我今當為未來之世一切眾生作擁護故，於後末世五十歲中，受持是經，乃至從他聞四句偈，要當讀誦悉令通利，流布與人，令不斷絕。
translated: I will now, for the sake of all beings in the future, act as their protector. In the final five hundred years, I will uphold this sūtra, and even if I hear only four lines of verse from others, I will read and recite them all, making them thoroughly understood, and spread them to others, causing them not to be cut off.

original: 」佛說是經已，寂意菩薩、諸天大眾、乾闥婆等、人及非人，皆大歡喜，頭面作禮，退坐而去。
analyzed: 」佛說是經已，寂意菩薩、諸天大眾、乾闥婆等、人及非人，皆大歡喜，頭面作禮，退坐而去。
translated: After the Buddha spoke this sūtra, Bodhisattva Tranquil Mind, the celestial multitudes, gandharvas and others, humans and non-humans, all greatly rejoiced, bowed their heads in reverence, and withdrew to sit to the side.

original: 悲華經卷第十明羅光明切光明功德山王山王奴賢月嚴修羅那剛吼自在相惱典
analyzed: 悲華經卷第十明羅光明切光明功德山王山王奴賢月嚴修羅那剛吼自在相惱典
translated: Sūtra of the Lotus Flower of the Wonderful Dharma, Scroll 10: Ming Luo Guangming Qie Guangming Gongde Shan Wang Shan Wang Nu Xian Yue Yan Xiu Luo Na Gang Hou Zizai Xiang Nao Dian
